name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-oriented Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development, focusing on designing and delivering robust backend systems. Proficient in **C/C++**, **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask), and **Golang** for building scalable microservices, leveraging **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for cloud-native solutions. Skilled in **Linux**, **containers**, and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines. Expertise in **DPDK**, **network segmentation**, and multithreading for optimizing performance. Proven success in developing high-performing APIs and automation tools, with a solid track record at distinguished companies such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Passionate about advancing technology through impactful projects and innovative solutions.
